content.detailedDescription: Shortly past sunset a bright light then mibs ...Contact me for more
content.summary: A sheet or shower or wall of light then mib activity or county 'employees'

content.detailedDescription:
Received  a call stating 2 ufo were in the sky, went outside, in the south/southeast heard swish/whir sound, dogs howling from serveal directions. there was a bright strobe like light flashing from the north/northwest moving south by southwest, appeared lower to the ground. after being outside awhile we walked heading west looking in the sky, the caller said they were still in sight. just before coming in, on three occasions saw three greeish light shooting from high in the sky going south/southwest downward, they looked like a shooting star, fading the closer it came to the ground, speed was very fast. the ufo was high in the sky, south, the lights of it made a shape like an arrow with the tip pointing east, the shaped changed or moved. got to cold went inside after 20 minutes or so, the shape was still in the sky. the noise (heard in the south/southeast)had stopped maybe 5 minutes are so of being outside, the bright flashing light in the north disapeared after ten minutes or so.

another person's account thought the ufo was like a group of glesting stars moving from east to west very slowly.

all three of us observed the shooting orb type light and the ufo had moved in location.
content.summary: Got call abt 2 ufo, in the s/se heard swish/whir sound, dogs howling in several directions, saw 3 greeish light like a shooting star going s/sw, ufo lights shaped like arrow with tip pointing e. a bright flashing light was moving from the n/nw to s/sw

content.detailedDescription: After send to my daughter to the school (13,00hs mex- time), back to my house ,i look the rain and clouds, (13,15 hs)  when i look ne i see a ligth between the dark cloud, i think is a small airplane (cessna 182) most common in this area, take my binoculars and small object, play with the rain, appear and desappear in the cloud, take my picture camera but the zoom not help me, after few minutes observation,  the object desappear with the cloud (ne) . . . first time see a ufo , very happy to see . . .
content.summary: Check the rain in my balcony, look "ne" and in the dark cloud, see a ligth

content.detailedDescription: I was on burlington mountain bow hunting  and right at dark  i climb down out of tree w my climber stand and noticed behind me in the sky a big bright light. at first it appeared to have a shape but then it just looked like a big round light. at first i thought star but i've never seen a star that big and that bright. it looked to be about half the size of the moon and it was a full moon that night. in the video i show both for comparison. then i thought well maybe it was a plane reflecting light but knew full well i was trying to explain away what i was seeing. it was huge and far away. it was slowly moving across the sky i mean slowly. this is when i started recording it w my i phone 5 cause i knew i was watching a ufo and i was gonna get the definitive video. i watched it for about 20 min while a was walking out of the corn field i was hunting in. it started to move away from me then would come back. it kept on getting real big then shrinking down. like watching a basketball shrink to pea size. dim then bright but there wasn't any clouds. the feeling i got was man are they coming for me and because of tv shows started looking for things like beams to bigfoot that's how serious it was. about 35 min into watching the object it came close enough to actually see 3 rings which made up the object , all rotating. one inside of the next. the reason i didn't stay and watch more is because i was already late to get where i needed to be and i had already recorded it for over 35 min and it pitch black.
content.summary: Got out of climber stand while deer hunting and seen it hovering in sky. it then slowly moved across the sky. seen it change directions multiple times

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out with my girlfriend. i noticed a light in the sky to the east. it went straight up slowly, then accended rapidly. it looked like it was kind of far away but was so bright it was still visible. no sound at all. after it went straight up for 10-15 seconds the light just went out.
content.summary: Red bright light shot straight up into the air.

content.detailedDescription: We first noticed the air craft as we were driving north on i-91 between enfield, ct and springfield, ma.  it first appeared as though it were lights on top of a tall tower, but we soon realized that they were too bright and too high to be any tower that we were aware of in the area.  it also did not appear to be moving fast enough to be an air craft.  as we approached it, the high way veered to the east and i was able to view the object out of the drivers' window of my car.  my wife was unable to see it at that point, but i could see that it was surrounded by white lights, and triangle-shaped with a red light in the middle... a "classic" triangle-shaped craft.  no lights were blinking, and it moved so slow that i could not tell if it were moving south or hovering.  i eventually lost sight of of it as we continued north on i-91.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped lighted hovered as we passed beneath it on the i-91 expressway.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the 11:00 news in north smithfield rhode island on june 14, 2013. family members were asleep upstairs. i felt a strange feeling of unease and nervousness for no reason. i was sitting near sliding glass doors with the curtain closed. for some reason, i stood up and wanted to look outside. 

as i peeked through the curtains,i looked across a 3 acre meadow toward the distant tree line. directly over one of the large distant trees was a bright, white, translucent, teardrop shaped, glowing object. it was the size of two full moons.It seemed to be illuminating a large area around it-brighter on the right than the left.I looked at the cable box clock and it was 11:11 on the dot. 

as i continued to look at the object,it blinked and lit up a fairly large area. it made the area near it light up as in a thunderstorm. it was hard to tell how far away it was. it could have been 1000 feet or a mile or more. it was hard to say. 

as i studied it closer,i saw four or five brighter white spots on it facing toward me. i wondered if they were beams. there were no lights or beams shining down on the meadow which remained dark.There were broken clouds that night.

i wondered where the beams could be pointing. i looked up to the clouds directly over the house and saw that the outer edges facing the object were outlined in white light like a beam of light was being projected on them from the object. it was stationary over the tree line for at least 5 minutes. at this point, i was absolutely terrified. 

i let the curtain close. i was too petrified to ask my family to come and see it and i also was trying to protect them from potential harm. the object stayed there for at least 5 minutes in place. i looked again after that and it was totally gone and the sky was once again pitch black.

when it was gone i was very, very shaken up. i could not sleep all night. i called my friend in weymouth massachusetts to talk and she told me people in nearby quincy were demanding answers from their local government about sightings there within the few days prior. i am still traumatized and apprehensive about the event.
content.summary: big bright white teardrop hovering with beams over n. smithfield ri 6/14/2013 @11:11pm

content.detailedDescription: I was with my girlfriend and father on our way home from picking my father up from work. i was in mid conversation with my dad when my girlfriend pointed out a strange aircraft with very bright white lights and bright flashing red lights. my dad and i thought it was a plane cause it appeared to be moving but, as we got closer at a stop light we discovered it was not moving but, stationary. it was then at the traffic light the it actually looked like a light from on top of a radio tower but, knowing that it was way to high and being from the area i also know that there is not any such towers in the area the object started to draw more and more attention from all of us. for about 5-7 minutes the object was in sight and was definitely stopped,stationary,and seemed to look like it was hovering. then as i tried to set up a video with my dad's phone the object took off in what i believe to be the nw direction at an incredible speed and almost looked as if it sort of shifted directions a bit. i did manage to get some video of this mysterious object as it was leaving the area but, due to it being dark out it is not the best quality and all of us in the car including myself were awestruck at how uncanny and bizarre this sighting was.
content.summary: Very strange aircraft in the night sky flashing bright red lights and very bright white lights that remained on at all times and the craft hovered over levittown in bucks county pa and then abruptly started moving very fast in what i believe was the nw

content.detailedDescription: As passenger in vehicle observed white/blue light appox 300 yards away hovering in air. witness passed light than backed up to observe. object than began to come towards vehicle. when light came within 100 yards witness became alarmed and left area with light following them.Light came no closer than appox 100 yards and followed vehicle for appox 2 miles than disapeared.Light was not seen again.
content.summary: White light observed in field while in vehicle

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my apartment and looked up. i noticed an odd set of lights that at first i thought was possibly a coast guard helicopter. there was no sound. no faa lights. i was close enough to hear if it was a helicopter. the object appeared as three or more cubes of different colors, rotating in different directions around a central red sphere. there was a multi-color glow that grew and shrank around the entire object. it moved very slowly to the northwest for 30-45 seconds. it ascended slightly, grew smaller and brighter, picked up its speed, flashed and blinked out of existence.
content.summary: A sphere with 3 cubes rotating in opposite directions around the sphere.

content.detailedDescription: After arriving home late from work. approx 10:15pm i noticed a very bright and large "star" just under orions left foot and just to the right of the north star. it appeared "closer" and brighter than i thought a star should be and was blinking colors sort of like a planet does. initially i got a cheap pair of binoculars from the house but they made viewing worst. so i grabbed my phone. i have  droid maxx and switched on the video camera. what i saw will blow you away! initially before i zoomed in the single bright blinking light became four distinct lights in a line in sort of the traditional saucer pattern. a series of 3 to 4 lights would flash across in a straight line with the two on each end. when i zoomed in after a minute or so it was the mist incredible thing i've ever seen. massive object (only can see black outline of craft) but it was covered in many lights that blinked and flashed dome in sequence and some random. the craft is cigar shaped with a sail shape on one end. distinct bright flashing red light towards top part of "sail" structure and dozens of other lights all over the craft. i have close to 5 mins of video which i have not released but will after i protect my rights to it and have some "professionals" validate it. i want no chance of hoax or anything else. only 3 people have seen video besides my wife who witnessed event and all 3 were blown away. one actually became frightened and concerned. i have proof and utbus undeniably "something" itsno star, no planet, not a plane or helicopter or blimp. its the real deal. please have someonecontact me and llet's get thus video checked out and released to the world. its incredible!!!!!
content.summary: I have the most amazing video

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night in july around 8-9 pm. my girlfriend and i had stepped out to have a cigarette, as we are talking i notice this huge square object out of the corner of my eye, i point to her look at that i say. we look in amazement 70 foot square object just silently gliding almost, through the air, 4 white lights on each corner no more than 500 feet off the ground, pulsating at the same time. the object was dark and outlined almost and for sure solid. then like that it was gone in a flash.
content.summary: It was around 8-9 pm and me and my girlfriend were outside having a cigarett when i happened to see out of my eye a huge 70 foot or so square object.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i looked at the sky and saw a bright fireball with a tail falling to earth. i assume. it was pink, yellow, and orange. my dog and i ran all the way home, and i told my husband, and i called a friend, and even emailed a sort of expert. i did not realize i could report it on here till now. it was falling towards new hampshire. i live in maine. my husband and i watched it fade out of sight. likely a meteor, but it was pretty big looking. i never found any reports on it.
content.summary: Something falling through our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was at my parents visiting and was laying in bed and decided to star gaze out the window, and boy that was a mistake. it was 1:00am and i didn't get to bed until 3. i noticed a star, that moved and i though okay, meteor shower? then i saw another one and was able to follow it as it flew around changing colors, stopping briefly and zooming off. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me, but i had solid points of reference. the harder i looked the more i could see. somewhere around 6 is what i safely want to say, but it was hard to tell because they moved so fast and would also flicker out at times. they changed in colors from white,blue,green,orange,red and yellow. the consistence of the output of light changed a lot, and at times was quite extraordinary brilliant. they looked like stars, but they were not stars! they would join together and then zoom away, their movements were unpredictable, yet deliberate. after a while i decided to go downstairs and wake my mother up, which was no help because she has poor vision, but i needed someone to tell me i wasn't crazy. after that failed attempt, and still feeling quite insane, i went back up and decided to watch some more. after ten minutes or so, sure enough on the horizon zooming straight up into the sky and seemed to dance with each other and then zoom away. there movements varied so much that i was in awe, from quickly zooming, to slowly like hovering, to dashing off to the left, or falling slowly etc. so after an hour of this, i decided to get on the computer and report what i saw and do some research. (as far as i know the phenomenon was still occurring at this point.) first off concluded that i am not crazy and not seeing things. i had a few great reference points because of the way i was laying in bed, so it wasn't my eyes playing tricks on me. secondly i made my report and after doing so had some closure, so was able to finally go to bed. i lost sight of the objects by shutting my curtains, leaving my bedroom door open and demanding a night light from my mother.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star like objects zipping accross the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside our garage with my father in law when i saw a red/orange light emerging in the air from the south above the building complex in front of us.  i really didn't pay to much attention because this is l.A.  and it could have been anything, but after a minute or two i notice it was just floating above us at a south easterly location high above the sky.  that is when my father in law and i joked it was a ufo.  we actually  thought it could have been a sky lantern because of the color of the object, the height and distance, and the light was pulsating.  we had a conversation of what it could be when it started to float slowly to the east, then back to the west, then going south.  my father in law then began to record the object (which he did for over 5 minutes), as it slowly moved west it stopped and floated stationary before slowly floating to the south and then moving east where the light just disappeared.
content.summary: Red/orange light in the sky floated, hovered, and moved around downtown downey

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my garden. the kreepy krawley (pool cleaning mechanism) got stuck and i had to move it. 

2. i looked at the sky because it was very starry. but this one star looked a bit different. i didn't get any feeling. it just looked different. not moving.

3. i didn't know what it was. it just looked different. it was star-like but not actually a star. it hadn't moved an inch. so i went to get my canon powershot a490 camera to photograph it.

4. when i tried to get it in focus (autofocus) it jumped around. up, down, sideways. that annoyed me because i wanted a clear shot. it went zig-zaggy all over the place.

5. during the siting i was annoyed because it moved around so much. i took a few pics and then went inside because i was fed up. i had a cold and it was late.

6. i didn't lose sight. it was still there and i just gave up and went in because i was tired and feeling cold.

i had a temperature, a strong flu and was feeling tired and dizzy well before this sighting. i believe that these things exist, and thought the photo may interest some people. 

the camera was just there on the counter top. i use it to take pics of my flowers and upload to facebook.

my son, who is really into this has since changed the image resolution on my camera to much higher. i'm not very camera savvy and he thinks they'll be back. so the camera is at the ready just in case.

i'm a retired widow, turning 70 next year. natural redhead still *my son said to say this as he thinks they are interested in genetic variation).

overall, i'm quite surprised and didn't have much hope getting an image on the cheapy camera.
content.summary: Saw a light in sky, bit different to stars so grabbed camera and it moved when i tried to snap a pic.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside my sister's house gazing at the stars when i saw an orange glow approach from south east direction. it was momentarily obscured behind a tree, then it appeared out from it. i first thought someone was flying a lighted kite because the glow looked like it but when the object moved in a curved path, passing over houses at the end of the street,i realized that it was a ufo as there was no sound. there were no strobe lights and the glow appeared to flicker slightly. as the object flew away in a curved path, its light dimmed and before getting obscured again by houses, it had dimmed completely.
the moment i saw the object, i knew it was not an aircraft because there was no sound and secondly, the light was a glow without there being a beam effect. the ufo was at a pretty low altitude of about 300ft and it moved without wavering in path. i could have mistaken it for an aircraft had the glow been of the color of landing lights. i watched the object fully aware that it was most probably a ufo and as the light dimmed, i was even more convinced of the craft being under intelligent control. the light of the ufo dimmed before it disappeared behind houses dimmed to a small point of light. 
it seems that the craft was accelerating throughout the curved path.
i watched the scene calmly and at no time did i take my eyes off the object. it will be apt to say here that i was standing outside and gazing at the skies to see if there is really something out there and i just saw that.
content.summary: There was an orange light that flew in a curved path.

content.detailedDescription:
saw a ufo-like object moving from the marina to just over hayes valley. it stopped suddenly, hovered in place for a few seconds the quickly began heading west towards the ocean. the object was very bright, multi-colored (red, green and purple) and was flying very low (less than three hundred feet). it made no detectable noise-- an object of this size, moving at these speeds and this low to the ground should have made a serious rumble.Unfortunately i lost sight of it as it moved west. when i first saew it, it was moving very fast then came to a stop over hayes valley/ fillmore western addition. it then seem to descend a little then regain some altitude. after hovering another second or two it moved off quickly to the west towards the pacific ocean (although not as fast as when it was moving in a direction from north to south).  i was on the phone with  when this occurred so i could not get a picture. it was in my field of vision for less than 15 seconds so getting a decent shot would have been impossible anyway.
what i saw was not a conventional aircraft (plane, helicopter, hot air balloon etc). i do not know what it was other than it was something i have never seen before. i have been on google to see if anyone has reported anything. so far that has been a bust.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was talking on the phone and witnessed a ufo like object moving across the sky.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
When we first saw the sighting we were outside smoking a cigarette and i saw a blinking orb,sphere like shape flying at first i thought it was just a fast plane but than after about 10 minutes (8 minutes exactly) i looked up and it was still there just hovering,me and my friend were looking all over for a camera or phone for 10 minutes and we started recording.After about 5 minutes it was still there blinking about 5 different colors including the following
red,blue,green,orange and purple
we proceeded to record and after about another 5 minutes a huge star like shape appeared it was moving very slow and was not blinking  
it hovered and stopped then hovered and stopped continuously 
after that we started to freak out a little 
about 10 continuous ufo filled minutes 
we both(me and my friend) couldn't see the blinking orb 
anymore so we went back outside
and went to the top floor of the building we saw the blinking orb again
after about 5 more minutes recording we were looking for other suspicious things and out of no where my friend saw this teardrop shaped smoke/cloud thing that dropped very quickly then disappeared ,my friend was freaking out and she was crying and wanting to go inside i insisted we stay to get more proof/evidence 
and sure enough after about not even 3 minutes i see 1 myself a circle of smoke/cloud just moving to its right very quickly then vanished 
me being quite freaked out myself wanted to go inside to see if the recording had seen the smoke orbs, sadly it had not 
but we still about 15-20 minutes of proof for the blinking orb
we came inside again and looked out our window to see if it was still there and sure enough the blinking orb moving much quicker was still there hovering slowly over a building the bright star like orb was about 30 feet away from where we originally saw it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: At first we thought is was a pplane but then it stayed in one spot and hovered for about 8 minutes blinking many different colors so we got our camera and recorded it

content.detailedDescription: Driving on east on highway 8 from san diego to phoenix when i spotted the lights in a very dark empty sky. my girlfriend also saw it the first time.  i then told my son who was in the back seat where to look when it reappeared.  he first thought it may be a tower, but we quickly realized it was much too high and there was no tower anywhere. the lights were well above the nearby mountains.
content.summary: Lights appeared in a dark sky and appeared to turn around. saw two different times by 3 people.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my back door looking into the sky like i do on regular occurrences just gazing at the stars. when looking straight up i saw a large dark triangular shadow pass over the top of my house and neighborhood heading from north to south. it had some haziness to the front sides of the triangle. made no noise and was traveling pretty fast for an object that size. larger than any plane i have ever seen even at the altitude it was flying (i live next to an air force base).
content.summary: Black, misty, triangular, blocked out stars, flying from north to south, made no sound,

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the parking lot in my apartment complex when a black triangular object in the night sky to the south of where i was standing caught my eye on the backdrop of the gray clouds. it seemed to move as a plastic bag moves in the wind. at first i thought the object was a large bird like a hawk hovering in the sky until i noticed the lights. i felt in awe and amazement when i realized what this objects must be. the object basically stayed in the same area for the 10 to 15 minutes duration that i witnessed it but it moved up down left right closer and further like i previously described as a plastic bag floating around in the wind. the object had two red lights that appeared on it from time to time as it moves about but not steadily. i attempted to record video on my phone but for some reason the object would not show up on the screen to my phone perhaps due to insufficient lighting. there is a small private airport in the direction of where i witnessed this object which it seemed to be very close to or maybe even over. after 10 to 15 minutes of viewing the object it started to rain i then got into my car and when i return home and hour later the object was no longer there. 

after reviewing the video taken on my cell phone carefully you can barely make out a black dot in the center of the screen, the point where the camera zooms in you can see a black dot in the sky in the very center of the video. i stopped filming because i thought i didn't capture anything, i have added this video with this submission.
content.summary: Black triangle dancing in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
at 6:50pm on saturday 23,2013 during a birthday for a 2 year old in  a backyard in riverside california, i noticed a red light in the sky heading south in our direction.Three others i was with noticed it also, i said it's a ufo. at that moment it changed direction turning west as it turned the light slowly went out as it descend and slowed to almost a stop, then continued west without light's. it was still visible in the darkness it looked like a football shaped mass that seemed to blend in with the darkness of the night as it traveled on a path that seemed to descend west, we watched it till it was out of sight.
i felt like the ufo knew we saw it so it changed direction.
content.summary: Red light in sky going south

content.detailedDescription: I was riding the bus home like i do everyday, staring out the window into the sky. then, i sighted two objects moving very fast (probably around 750 mph). they both appeared very small, but were probably around 10 feet across. i could only tell that they were there because the sunlight (it was about 3pm) was reflecting off them. after watching them for about two minutes, the both stopped abruptly, then hovered for another minute, until one whizzed off incredibly fast (warping away?). the second one remained for a few seconds longer, before gradually shrinking into nothingness, perhaps it was ascending into space.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two strange objects sighted over boston

content.detailedDescription:
We were in mammoth lakes in the mountains on vacation.
i saw the object on three different locations and times.
it looked like a flying barrel. i have another picture i am trying to find.
i had forgot about it until we were trying to find pictures of my father-in-law who is dying of luekemia. 
when i first saw it i was suprised and did not think much about it and in fact forgot it. ron

   i have seen several sighting here in nc as well but the object looked different.
content.summary: Object flying in seirra mountains

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba trabando de vigilante cuando estaba haciendo una ronda e una  silueta de colores ,me llamo la atencin  mire por encima de las montaas i vi una esfera de todos los colores incandescente que se mova en mi direccin i se inmovilizo quedndose de un  color verde e sin resplandor hacia fuera de la esfera e sin ningn ruido ,entonces  yo pens que seria un globo o un helicptero o algo as ,cuando de pronto 2 esferas mas pequeas del mismo color verde salieron disparadas en formacin en forma  de v i desaparecieron ,entonces una llama aparicio detrs de la gran esfera i vi el contorno izquierdo la esfera i era de un metal como la plata o algo as ,cuando se apago la llama la esfera verde empez a desplazarse lentamente en horizontal durante 10 segundo i de pronto "nada"  ya no estaba como si ava desaparecido en la noche .
tambin desde entonces mi forma de ver la vida cambio i creo en vida mas haya de nuestro sistema solar.
un saludo diego.
content.summary: Bola verde

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en un parque donde prcticamente se ve todo alicante, vi una luz fija estaa y me quede observndola cuando empez a aumentar y disminuir su luz, se lo comente al resto de personas que avan con migo en el momento y nos pusimos a observar mas aun, cuando de repente la luz empez a moverse hacia el lado derecho, salieron mas luces en movimiento todas en linea recta una al lado de la otra y se poda apreciar que era un platillo y que estaba girando, era muy clara la visin del platillo, luego volvi a donde estaba al principio, pareca que descenda y salan focos alumbrando hacia el suelo, luego desaparecio.
content.summary: Primero apareci una luz fija que aumentaba y disminua el intenso de la luz y luego se movi hacia la derecha donde se amplio y apareci un clarisimo platillo volante

content.detailedDescription:
I was dog sitting for our next door neighbor and on this night i decided to have a fire in their fire pit. i was watching the sky while sitting next to the fire and then looked through an opening in the trees to the west. that's when i noticed an orange light. i stood up and took a few steps in that direction and watched for blinking lights in case it was a plane - there were no blinking lights. it was a steady orange glow and it appeared to be a sphere or orb. we live fairly close to the coast and it seemed this light must have been out over the water (gulf of mexico). i kept watching it and it appeared to be moving away from my position although it was hard to tell...Then it made a turn to my left(toward the south). it was not an abrupt turn, but a slow turn. it then went out of sight behind the trees. 

this is the first and only sighting i've ever had, i'm 44 yrs old. it was the only thing i've ever seen that i couldn't explain. unfortunately, i was alone when it happened. i was excited that i was seeing it but tried to remain calm because i didn't want my emotions to convince myself that i was seeing something that wasn't really there.
content.summary: Traveling orange orb

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to back yard for a smoke. noticed above my head 6 spherical objects moving north. bottoms of objects is what i saw. objects were copper colored with thin lines or thread like lines of gold intersecting on bottom of all spheres. 5 spheres moved in a very tight formation, at times seemed to touch or move into each other. 1 sphere moved along side of the 5 could have been a bit bigger than the 5 as a whole. observed this for about 30 seconds or so. objects did not move terribly fast but seemed to have a,"controlled speed?" no obvious light coming from any of them. lit only, by i suppose light from surrounding houses and street lights. no sound at all coming from these objects. objects faded into night sky. wasn't scared, awed certainly. have seen lots of ufos around here, but this is the only one i have felt a need to report.
content.summary: Nov. 24 2013,approximately 8 pm. saw 6 spherical objects moving over my head in a northern path.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends apartment with two other friends when we noticed something strange on the sky. it was a group of 10+ flying objects and they were orange. they were flying slowly and they just started do disappear one by one. we do not have an airport in our city, so these things were not helicopters or airplanes. one of our friends has some acquaintances in belgrade and they said that they saw this too.
content.summary: Orange objects
